Wind-and water-resistant, this ultra-light style pulls over your head with a half ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $31.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:47:26 UTC – Details)


Here’s a gotta-have pullover jacket that has endless uses in your weekend wardrobe. This lightweight, effortless windbreaker from Champion is perfect to toss in your weekend tote, to keep in your golf bag, or with your workout gear. Wind-and water-resistant, this ultra-light style pulls over your head with a half zipper and features a handy scuba-style neckline and hood with bungee cord closure. Better yet, it folds right up into its own front zip pocket, creating a neat little pouch that fits anywhere, even a briefcase. This packable jacket can be easily layered over a sweatshirt or sweater. And it’s detailed with elasticized cuffs to keep out wind and rain, plus a bungee-cord hem to adjust as you choose. And maybe the best thing about it is that it’s made of 100% recycled polyester so you can feel good about wearing it. When you wear this packable windbreaker jacket, you’ll proudly display the Champion logo on the chest and the iconic “C” logo appliquéd at the left cuff.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 22 x 18 x 1 inches; 8.68 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ V1012
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 15, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Champion
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B078GPYT9H

Imported
Polyester lining
Zipper closure
Machine Wash
WIND- AND WATER-RESISTANT – A special waterproof coating will come in handy whenever the weather takes a turn.
LIGHT AND PACKABLE – Folds into its own zip pocket to form a neat pouch you can tuck away anywhere.

Style Name: Bandit Half Zip

Apparel for those in the mountains, on the trail, or racing to the finish.

Spyder is one of the largest winter sports brands in the world, as well as an Official Supplier to the U.S. Ski Team. Spyder apparel integrates high-technology fabrication, sport-specific function, and fashion conscious designs. Based in Boulder, CO, the company sells high performance sportswear in the United States, Canada, and more than 50 countries worldwide.

Bandit Half Zip

Fleece Jacket

An excellent first layer for its combo of wicking side panels and warm sweater knit bonded to fleece everywhere else, the half zip Bandit is made for cold-weather sports, but is stylish enough for just sauntering around town.

Specs:

  • Light‐weight polyester sweater knit bonded to anti‐pill fleece
  • Brushed microfiber inner collar and hand pockets
  • Zippered hand pocket
  • Spyder embroidered logos

Secure zippered chest pocket

It’s warm, breathable and comfortable fleece ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $48.75
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:23:01 UTC – Details)


The Daybreaker fleece jacket for men has a super-lightweight full front zip design. A versatile jacket perfect for keeping warm on chilly autumn nights, as a light mid layer in spring and summer or paired with some classic Helly Hansen base layers in winter. It’s warm, breathable and comfortable fleece stretch material construction is a year-round companion for any outdoor, sailing or ski enthusiast.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.84 x 7.87 x 6.69 inches; 9.92 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 51598
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 11, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Helly Hansen – Private Brands – US
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0753WY9HF

Imported
Machine Wash
Super-lightweight full-zip fleece design

HELLY HANSEN – ALIVE SINCE 1877

From our home in Norway, Helly Hansen has been making professional grade gear to help people stay and feel alive for more than 140 years. It all started in 1877 when sea captain Helly Juell Hansen found a better way to stay protected from the harsh Norwegian elements. Soon thereafter, Captain Hansen and his wife Margrethe launched a business producing waterproof oilskin jackets, trousers, sou’westers and tarpaulins made from coarse linen soaked in linseed oil – and the legend was born!

Helly Hansen gear is worn and trusted by professionals on oceans, mountains and worksites. As the #1 apparel brand for Ski Professionals, you’ll find HH at more than 200 ski resort and guiding operations around the world, and worn by more than 55,000 ski professionals. Our sailing gear is worn by world-class sailors across all five oceans, and we’re proud to partner with and participate in some of the sport’s most iconic regattas and sailing associations. As a leading Scandinavian workwear brand, you’ll see us at work-sites where performance, protection and safety matter most. We continue to support Captain Hansen’s legacy through a long list of first-to-market innovations developed through insights from those working and recreating in the world’s harshest environments.

MOUNTAIN

Since 1877 Helly Hansen has worked with professionals in Norway to create gear so people can stay and feel alive in the beautiful but harsh Scandinavian outdoors.The insights drawn from outdoor professionals, their knowledge and experience have been instrumental in creating our mountain line of today. Based on this knowledge we aim to continuously redefine the way we design, develop and use outdoor gear to experience and preserve the outdoors for generations to come.

Read more

SAILING

As the recognized global leader in sailing, our gear is worn by world-class sailors across all five oceans on anything from dinghies to 100ft foiling catamarans. In the Spring of 2020 we take another big leap and partner with the professionals on the American Magic team to change, shape and create the future technologies of sailing and win the 36th America’s Cup.

Read more

SKI

Since 1877 Helly Hansen has been delivering product solutions for those working in the outdoors. We believe that by focusing on the needs of the outdoor professional that we will exceed the needs of the recreational user and improve both of their experiences outdoors. Working with over 55,000 professionals in the ski industry, we utilize their feedback and experience to drive our product development process to consistently deliver products that meet the demands of the professional environment.

Read more

HELLY HANSEN WORKWEAR

Helly Hansen is the brand trusted by professionals. Since 1877 they have created professional grade gear to help people stay and feel alive. Helly Hansen’s workwear collection is built to make sure you get the job done. Today of course Helly Hansen is synonymous with high quality and reliability, the tool of choice for the serious tradesman and used globally as survival and rescue gear by emergency services including the Royal National Lifeboat Institution, the world’s oldest lifeboat service.

Read more

Look no further than this colorblock parka to keep you warm on cold practice days or in between swim events. Cozy fleece lining and a water-resistant shell make this lightweight, packable style the only outerwear you need. Highlights Cozy fleece lining Water-resistant outer layer Lightweight design 2-way zipper (inside & out) Hooded Outer: 100% Polyester Inner: 100% Polyester Fleece.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16 x 15 x 6 inches; 2 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ USXTEAMPARKAA
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 3, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Speedo Swimwear
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00YT3JCS0

Imported
Zipper closure
Hand Wash Only
COZY FLEECE: Soft inner fleece lining for extra warmth and faster drying time
WATER-RESISTANT: Outer layer resists water and moisture
LIGHTWEIGHT: Easily roll up and take with you anywhere

YOUR TEAM YOUR COLORS

From diving pairs to racing teams, Speedo team apparel can help you look like a cohesive unit. Show up to competitions with matching or coordinating team swimwear and apparel and you'll look and feel ready to show the other teams who's boss.

Fleece Lined

Fleece lined for extra warmth for those cold morning practices.

Zipper

Two-way zipper on parkas allows one to move more freely. Highest quality zippers are used.

Pockets

Convenient pockets on the front.

Draw String

Easily adjusted for the perfect fit.

With a wide variety of colors, patterns and styles available, you can outfit the whole team to match your team or school.

What the team wears headed onto deck and pool is an important choice, find the perfect color and pattern to represent everyone.
